metadata.title: CVE-2017-8392 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed inGNU Binutils 2.28, is vulnerable to an invalid read of size 8 because ofmissing a check to determine whether symbols are NULL in the_bfd_dwarf2_find_nearest_line function. This vulnerability causes programsthat conduct an analysis of binary programs using the libbfd library, suchas objdump, to crash.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
